Description_lang: Infusion of Light has $s1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional $s4%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional $s2%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional $s3%.

name_blz.es_MX: Inflorescencia de la Fuente del Sol
name_blz.es_ES: Inflorescencia de La Fuente del Sol

description_blz.en_US: Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%.
description_blz.es_MX: Infusión de luz tiene 1 carga más, aumenta un 50% más el efecto de Sentencia mayor, la sanación de Destello de luz aumenta un 15% más, y la sanación de Luz sagrada aumenta un 15% más.
description_blz.pt_BR: Infusão de Luz tem 1 carga adicional, aumenta o efeito de Julgamento Maior em mais 50%, a cura de Clarão de Luz aumenta mais 15%, e a cura de Luz Sagrada aumenta mais 15%.
description_blz.de_DE: Eure 'Lichtinfusion' hat 1 zusätzliche Aufladung, erhöht den Effekt von 'Großes Richturteil' um weitere 50%, erhöht die Heilung von 'Lichtblitz' um zusätzlich 15% und erhöht die Heilung von 'Heiliges Licht' um zusätzlich 15%.
description_blz.en_GB: Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%.
description_blz.es_ES: Infusión de Luz tiene 1 carga adicional, aumenta un 50% el efecto de Sentencia superior, aumenta un 15% la sanación de Destello de Luz y aumenta un 15% la sanación de Luz Sagrada.
description_blz.fr_FR: Imprégnation de lumière bénéficie de 1 charge supplémentaire, augmente l’effet de Jugement supérieur de 50 % supplémentaires, les soins d’Éclair lumineux de 15 % supplémentaires, et les soins de Lumière sacrée de 15 % supplémentaires.
description_blz.it_IT: Infusione di Luce ha 1 carica aggiuntiva, aumenta l'efficacia di Giudizio Superiore del 50% aggiuntivo, aumenta le cure fornite da Lampo di Luce del 15% aggiuntivo e aumenta le cure fornite da Luce Sacra del 15% aggiuntivo.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Прилив Света" получает еще 1 заряд, усиливает "Великое правосудие" еще на 50%, а также усиливает исцеление от "Вспышки Света" еще на 15%, а от "Света небес" – еще на 15%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 빛 주입이 추가로 1회 충전되고 상급 심판의 효과가 추가로 50%만큼 증가합니다. 또한 빛의 섬광의 치유량이 추가로 15%만큼, 성스러운 빛의 치유량이 추가로 15%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 聖光灌注可額外使用1次，使強效審判的效果額外提高50%，聖光閃現的治療效果額外提高15%，聖光術的治療效果額外提高15%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 圣光灌注的使用次数增加1次，强效审判的效果额外提高50%，圣光闪现的治疗效果额外提高15%，圣光术的治疗效果额外提高15%。
